title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is showing excessive flashing. This issue needs further investigation to determine the cause.
OB: When using the Control Example, there is a lot of flashing happening on the screen.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, reducing the amount of flashing on the screen.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Observe the flashing that is happening on the screen.
